step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed and arms drawn in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Ensure you are exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Great job! Continue to open your fingers and extend your arms horizontally. Remember to exhale and relax.
You're doing well with the arm extension. Focus on keeping the movement smooth and controlled throughout.
Excellent execution of the horizontal pumping motion. Keep up the good work with the breathing and muscle engagement.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers, draw arms in, inhale, and tighten muscles.
Good transition. Open your fingers, extend arms, exhale, and relax. Focus on controlled movement.
Keep up the great work! Continue opening fingers and extending arms while exhaling and relaxing.
You're maintaining good form. Ensure your arms extend horizontally to shoulder height.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You've successfully completed the horizontal pumping exercise with good control.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on closing your fists and inhaling while drawing your arms in, then opening your hands and exhaling as you extend your arms. Keep up the consistent effort!
